job.title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test – QA Regression Automation
job.description: ltstronggtltugtcompany descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtour missionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtat palo alto networks everything starts and ends with our missionltbrgtltbrgtbeing the cybersecurity partner of choice protecting our digital way of lifeltbrgtltbrgtwe have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before these arent easy goals to accomplish but were not here for easy were here for better we are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we areltbrgtltbrgtwere changing the nature of work palo alto networks is evolving to meet the needs of our employees now and in the future through flexwork our approach to how we work from benefits to learning location to leadership weve rethought and recreated every aspect of the employee experience at palo alto networks and because it flexes around each individual employee based on their individual choices employees are empowered to push boundaries and help us all evolve togetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtyour careerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas part of the automated regression qa team you will be responsible for the design and development of infrastructure tools and scripts for automated testing of palo alto networks nextgeneration firewallsltbrgtltbrgtthis position will focus on development of automation infrastructure of regression execution such as automation of setting up testbeds for hardware virtual and cloud firewall as well as maintaining and enhancing tools for test executionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtyour impactltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtdesign and develop scripts and tools in python for automated regression testing executionltligtltligtconsult with developers qa it engineers to define regression testing requirementsltligtltligtdesign and develop web pages in pythonltligtltligtsetup and maintain automation testbeds and infrastructure toolsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtyour experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtsolid understanding of object oriented design principlesltligtltligt years full time python developmentltligtltligtgood knowledge of tcpip and socket level programmingltligtltligtexperience writing sql database queriesltligtltligtexperience using linux esxi and vcenterltligtltligtexperience in cloud technologies is nice to haveltligtltligtexcellent communication skills both written and verballtligtltligtdegree in computer science or engineeringltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtadditional informationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtour commitmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwere trailblazers that dream big take risks and challenge cybersecuritys status quo its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating together to learn more about our dedication to inclusion and innovation visit our life at palo alto networks page and our diversity websiteltbrgtltbrgtpalo alto networks is an equal opportunity employer we celebrate diversity in our workplace and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental
